questions.title: Logic Statement
questions.statement: If all cats are animals, and all animals need food, then all cats need food
questions.explanation: This is a valid logical syllogism. The conclusion follows from the premises.

questions.title: Pattern Recognition
questions.description: Identify the next number in the sequence
questions.question: What comes next in this sequence: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
questions.explanation: Each number is double the previous number: 2×2=4, 4×2=8, 8×2=16, 16×2=32

questions.title: Probability Statement
questions.statement: When flipping a fair coin, the probability of getting heads is 50%
questions.explanation: A fair coin has two equally likely outcomes, so P(heads) = 1/2 = 50%
